price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߟߊߡߐ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߡߊ߬ߖߐ߯ߙߊ߲ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߞߵߊ߬ ߕߘߍ߬ ߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߟߊ߬ߜߍ߬ߟߌ߬ߓߊߟߌߦߊ ߥߐ߬ߦߐ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: أَوَمَن يُنَشَّؤُاْ فِي ٱلۡحِلۡيَةِ وَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡخِصَامِ غَيۡرُ مُبِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: awaman yunasha-u fī al-ḥil'yati wahuwa fī al-khiṣāmi ghayru mubīnin
